definition: orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
hand gesture in traditional dances (joined thumb and middle finger, the rest extended)

sentences.english: After lunch , the group will visit macadamia nuts farm , rainbow falls and an orchid garden.
sentences.chinese: 下午參觀夏威夷農場蘭花園和彩虹瀑布。

sentences.english: Various orchids stand on both sides of Golden Whip Stream.
sentences.chinese: 張家界金鞭溪遊道兩邊有多種蘭花植物。

sentences.english: This paper also viewed the future of the application of orchid industries.
sentences.chinese: 並對生物技術在蘭花產業中的應用前景進行了展望。

sentences.english: The accompanying ginger and plainly cooked broccoli also help offset the fat.
sentences.chinese: 配着的姜和簡單燒過的西蘭花菜也幫助抵消脂肪。

sentences.english: Spinach and broccoli are good sources.
sentences.chinese: 菠菜和西蘭花就是很好的來源。

sentences.english: Cymbidium is the city flower of Shaoxing and also a famous flower in China.
sentences.chinese: 蘭花是紹興市花，是我國傳統名花。

sentences.english: All the time, he savoured the gillyflowers in full bloom under my windows.
sentences.chinese: 他一直聞着盛開在我窗下的紫羅蘭花香氣。

sentences.english: Here’s one example. There are two species of orchids that live very close together in South Africa.
sentences.chinese: 在南非有兩種蘭花，它們生長在同一片區域。

sentences.english: Any of various small greenish birds of the genus Hylophilus of Central and South America, related to the vireos.
sentences.chinese: 中南美主要爲附生或石生蘭花的一個大屬，大小不同。

sentences.english: The tea has orchid aroma and tastes mellow and thick.
sentences.chinese: 沖泡後，有天然的蘭花香，滋味純濃。

sentences.english: It seems like so much more than, well, just broccoli.
sentences.chinese: 它似乎就這麼多，好了，只是西蘭花。

sentences.english: Orchids and orchid bees are a classic example of this relationship.
sentences.chinese: 蘭花和蘭蜂就是這種關係的典型例子。

sentences.english: Trim or cut your orchid plant roots in this free caring for an orchid video.
sentences.chinese: 修剪或削減在這個自由照顧蘭花視頻的蘭花植物的根。

sentences.english: Trim or cut your orchid plant roots in this free caring for an orchid video.
sentences.chinese: 修剪或削減在這個自由照顧蘭花視頻的蘭花植物的根。

sentences.english: Is it? Then I agreed, and magnolia good to be together each spring.
sentences.chinese: 是嗎？那我就和玉蘭花約定好每年春天都要相聚。

sentences.english: She rummaged around and held up a stem of green silk orchids .
sentences.chinese: 她左右，並舉行了一個乾的綠色絲綢蘭花。

definition: to open one's mouth/to start to talk
to become aware/to detect/to realize/to perceive
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
